title: Home on the Web!
detail: A series of innovative home automation projects on the web!
extended_details:
Home audio system to monitor and control living room TV volume.

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=j8D8YjgnGR4
Home-kit compatible for control by Siri.
Garage door opener and status monitor.
Monitor when mail and packages are delivered.
Check who is home.
SmartFridge (c) 
Control lights (through clapping?)

Powered by Raspberry Pis and the web
